# Janitor package
## Albert Rapp

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
nurses <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-10-05/nurses.csv")
names(nurses)
```

### a) Clean names

```{r}
library(janitor)

nurses |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  names()
```

### b) Clean a dirty dataset

```{r}
readxl::read_excel("C:/R_Files/afrodataviz/sub_pro_0_tutorials/data/dirty_data.xlsx", skip = 1) |>
  clean_names() |>
  remove_empty() |>
  remove_constant() |>
  mutate(hire_date = excel_numeric_to_date(hire_date))
```

### c) Starwars dataset find dupes

```{r}
starwars |>
  get_dupes(eye_color, hair_color, skin_color, sex, homeworld) |>
  select(1:8)
```

### d) tabyls

```{r}

mpg |>
  count(class, sort = TRUE) |>
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n))

tabyl(mpg, class) |>
  as_tibble() |>
  arrange(desc(n))

```
